book.synopsis: In this first of the Nancy Drew Mystery Stories, Nancy, unaided, seeks to find a missing will. Her search not only tests her keen mind but also leads her into a thrilling adventure. This volume presents the original, 1930 version of the story. In 1959 the story was rewritten and condensed and this original version went out of print.
book.title_long: The Secret of the Old Clock (Nancy Drew, Book 1)
book.dimensions: Height: 7.74 Inches, Length: 5.29 Inches, Weight: 0.95 Pounds, Width: 1.23 Inches
